trans-unit.source: Represents a class that provides data for the <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragDrop(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs)" />, <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.OnDragEnter(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs)" />, and <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs)" /> events in the workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: 表示为工作流设计器中的 <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragDrop(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs)" />、<see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.OnDragEnter(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs)" /> 和 <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs)" /> 事件提供数据的类。

trans-unit.source: These event arguments are passed to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classes when a drag-and-drop operation is in progress on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 在工作流设计图面上执行拖放操作时，会将这些事件参数传递给 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> 类。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classes can access the information contained in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs> class to influence the behavior of the operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> 类可以访问将影响操作行为的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs> 类中包含的信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of activities upon which a drag-and-drop operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: 获取对其执行拖放操作的活动的集合。

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection that contains all <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> objects on which the drag-and-drop operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: 包含对其执行拖放操作的所有 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 对象的只读集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location where the activities are to be dropped on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置工作流设计图面上要放置活动的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that defines the location on the workflow design surface where the activities will be dropped.
trans-unit.target: 定义工作流设计图面上将要放置活动的位置的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> class creates a drag image for the activities being dragged.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> 类为正在拖动的活动创建一个拖动图像。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> objects can use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs.DragImageSnapPoint%2A> property to snap the image to a target and drop the activities at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> 对象可以使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs.DragImageSnapPoint%2A> 属性使图像对齐到目标并将活动放置在指定位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> on the workflow design surface where a drag operation began.
trans-unit.target: 获取工作流设计图面上拖动操作开始的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that defines the location on the workflow design surface where the drag operation began.
trans-unit.target: 定义工作流设计图面上拖动操作开始位置的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />。
